howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1Text: Company name, industry and website. We automatically extract keywords and create the prompts.
howItWorks.step2Text: ChatGPT, Perplexity, AI Mode and AI Overviews are queried in real-time.
howItWorks.step3Text: See which prompts potential customers use. See exactly where you are and aren't mentioned ‚Äî or your competitors.

chatDemo.title: What does ChatGPT answer
chatDemo.userPrompt: "Can you recommend a good [your industry] in [your city]?"
chatDemo.aiResponse: "Of course! Here are some options I can recommend..."
chatDemo.aiQuestion: Is your business on this list?
chatDemo.aiQuestionBold: Or does AI only mention your competitors?
chatDemo.insight: Every day, people search via AI for businesses like yours.
chatDemo.insightBold: With a free account you'll see exactly where you stand.

accountFeatures.platformsDescription: ChatGPT, Perplexity, AI Mode & AI Overviews
accountFeatures.dashboardDescription: See why you are or aren't recommended ‚Äî and what you can do about it

cta.subtext: No credit card ‚Ä¢ Completely free ‚Ä¢ Instant insights

faq.a1: Teun.AI scans how visible your business is in AI search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity and Google. You enter your business details, we generate up to 10 commercial prompts, and you instantly see if you're being recommended.
faq.a2: You can scan 2x for free without an account with 10 prompts per scan on ChatGPT and Perplexity. With a free account you get daily scans, extra platforms (AI Mode & AI Overviews), your dashboard, and our Chrome extension.
faq.q3: Is Teun.AI right for my business?
faq.a3: Teun.AI is suitable for any business that wants to be visible online. Whether you're an SMB, startup or enterprise ‚Äî if your customers need to find you via AI search engines, Teun.AI is for you.
faq.q4: How long until I see results?
faq.a4: Your scan results are available immediately. Improving your AI visibility is a process that takes time, but with our actionable tips you can start right away.

urlModal.title: Enter your website URL
urlModal.description: We scan your website and automatically extract the right keywords from your pages, navigation and services. This gives you much more accurate results.
